item.title: Add Workdays Using Go
item.description: Go time package has extensive support for manipulating times and durations. For example, we can use the time package to find the next business days. Let’s create a small case for this.

item.title: How to Mock Gin-Gonic for JSON Response
item.description: Create an HTTP server using Gin is quite easy. While developing an application using Gin, I’m stumbled on how to test the JSON response using Gin.

item.title: Live Reload Golang Development With Gin
item.description: Coming from NodeJS land, I’m always relying on Nodemon to have live-reload my development server while developing. Long story short, I got a project that uses Golang as a drop-in replacement, and reloading the development server is PITA. I need to restart my development server every time I have changed inside my code.
